trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract definition of an action supported by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma definição abstrata de uma ação com suporte no serviço da Web em XML.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The Operation class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `operation` element enclosed by the `portType` element.
trans-unit.target: A classe de operação correspondente para o WSDL Web Services Description Language () `operation` elemento delimitados pelo `portType` elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre WSDL, consulte a especificação em http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"> </xref> associado a esta <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"> </xref> associado a esta <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of faults, or error messages, defined by the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de falhas ou mensagens de erro definidas pelo atual <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of faults, or error messages, defined by the current operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de falhas ou mensagens de erro, definidas pela operação atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> matches with the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o especificado <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref> corresponde com o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> to be checked to determine whether it matches with the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref> a ser verificada para determinar se ele corresponde com o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: if the instance matches the operationBinding parameter; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se o instância correspondências a operationBinding parâmetro; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of instances of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref> class defined by the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de instâncias de <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"> </xref> classe definida por atual <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Because an <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> is associated with exactly one <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationInput> and exactly one <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationOutput>, only one instance of each can be a member of this collection, and thus the collection can have a maximum of two members.
trans-unit.target: Porque um <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation>é associado a exatamente uma <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationInput>e exatamente um <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationOutput>, apenas uma instância de cada uma pode ser um membro dessa coleção e, portanto, a coleção pode ter no máximo dois membros.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationOutput> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationInput> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation>

trans-unit.source: The collection of instances of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref> class defined by the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de instâncias de <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"> </xref> classe definida por atual <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of the elements contained in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrderString*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma matriz de elementos contidos no <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrderString*>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrderString*>

trans-unit.source: The elements of this array are identical to those of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrderString%2A> property, but housed in an array rather than a space-delimited string.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos dessa matriz são idênticos do <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrderString%2A>propriedade, mas hospedada em uma matriz em vez de uma cadeia de caracteres delimitada por espaço.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrderString%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of names of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de nomes de <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"> </xref> instâncias.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an optional Remote Procedure Call (RPC) signature that orders specification for request-response or solicit-response operations.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma assinatura de chamada de procedimento remoto (RPC) opcional que ordena a especificação para operações de solicitação-resposta ou solicitação-resposta.

trans-unit.source: The named <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> instances must adhere to the following rules: - The order of the named <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> instances reflects the order of the parameters in the RPC (remote procedure call) signature, which is the name of the operation, its input and output parameters, the results it returns and the exceptions it might be asked to handle.
trans-unit.target: Nomeado <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart>instâncias devem aderir às seguintes regras:-a ordem dos nomeado <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart>instâncias reflete a ordem dos parâmetros na assinatura de RPC (chamada de procedimento remoto), que é o nome da operação, seus parâmetros de entrada e saídos, ele retorna resultados e as exceções que pode ser solicitado para lidar com.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart>

trans-unit.source: - The return value is not present in the list.
trans-unit.target: -O valor de retorno não está presente na lista.

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> name appears in both the input and output messages, it is an `in/out` parameter.
trans-unit.target: -Se a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart>nome aparece em ambas as mensagens de entrada e saídas, é um `in/out` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> name appears only in the input message, it is an `in` parameter.
trans-unit.target: -Se a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart>nome aparece somente na mensagem de entrada, é um `in` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> name appears only in the output message, it is an `out` parameter.
trans-unit.target: -Se a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart>nome aparece somente na mensagem de saída, é um `out` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart>

trans-unit.source: Note that this parameter list is not required, even if the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> is to be used with an RPC-style <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>.
trans-unit.target: Observe que esta lista de parâmetros não é necessária, mesmo que o que <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation>deve ser usado com um estilo RPC <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation>

trans-unit.source: Do not call ParameterOrderString directly.
trans-unit.target: Não chame ParameterOrderString diretamente.

trans-unit.source: This method is only used internally for XML serialization.
trans-unit.target: Esse método só é usado internamente para a serialização de XML.

trans-unit.source: To return the parameter list use <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrder%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar a lista de parâmetros use <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrder%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrder%2A>

trans-unit.source: A list of names of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> instances separated by a single space.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de nomes do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"> </xref> instâncias separadas por um único espaço.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref> of which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"></xref> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"> </xref> dos quais o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Operation"> </xref> é um membro.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref> object.
